trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus"></xref> Web server control.
trans-unit.target: Gir støtte for utforming i en visuelle utformeren for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus"> </xref> Web serverkontroll.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> control renders a button that automatically checks the authentication status of the user and displays the appropriate login or logout option.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus>kontrollen gjengir knapper som kontrollerer brukerens Godkjenningsstatus og viser det riktige alternativet for pålogging eller Logg av automatisk.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus>

trans-unit.source: In a visual designer, when you switch from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> control is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: I en visuelle utformeren når du bytter fra kilden til utformingsvisning markup kildekode som beskriver den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus>kontrollen analyseres og en utformingen versjon av kontrollen er opprettet på utformingsoverflaten.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus>

trans-unit.source: When you switch back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to the markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page.
trans-unit.target: Når du går tilbake til visning i datakilden, er utformingen kontrollen beholdt i markup kildekode og redigeres i markup for websiden.

trans-unit.source: The LoginStatusDesigner class provides design-time support for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> control.
trans-unit.target: Klassen LoginStatusDesigner gir støtte for utforming for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner.ActionLists%2A> property returns a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> object, which typically contains an object that is derived from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> class for each level in the inheritance tree of the designer.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner.ActionLists%2A>returnerer en <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>objektet, som vanligvis inneholder et objekt som er avledet av den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>klasse for hvert nivå i treet arving av designer.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner.ActionLists%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> property always returns `true`, indicating that the designer creates a temporary copy of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> to generate the design-time markup, since the user authentication status is not available at design time.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A>egenskapen returnerer alltid `true`, som angir at det opprettes en midlertidig kopi av det tilknyttede <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus>til å generere utformingen-markup fordi godkjenning brukerstatus ikke er tilgjengelig på utformingstidspunktet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method returns the markup that is used to render the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> at design time.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>metoden returnerer markup som brukes til å gjengi den tilknyttede <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus>under utformingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner.Initialize%2A> method prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner.Initialize%2A>Metoden Klargjør utformeren for å vise, redigere, og utforme tilknyttede <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner.Initialize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner> class when it creates the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> control or a copy of that control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework internt bygger en ny forekomst av den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner>klasse når det oppretter den tilknyttede <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus>kontroll eller en kopi av kontrollen på utformingsoverflaten.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Gets the designer action list collection for this designer.
trans-unit.target: Henter designer handlingen liste-samlingen for utformeren.

trans-unit.source: The ActionLists property creates a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> object for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner> class, adds it to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> that is obtained from the ActionLists base property, and then returns the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen ActionLists oppretter en <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>objekt den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner>klasse, legger den til den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>som er hentet fra egenskapen ActionLists basis, og returnerer det <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>samlingen.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"></xref> associated with this designer.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"> </xref> tilknyttet utformeren.

trans-unit.source: Gets the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Henter markup som brukes til å gjengi den tilknyttede kontrollen under utformingen.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus.LogoutText%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus.LoginText%2A> property (depending on whether the user is logged in), is `null`, an empty string (""), or a single space (" "), the GetDesignTimeHtml method sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus.LogoutText%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus.LoginText%2A> property, as appropriate, to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property, enclosed in brackets ("[ ]").
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus.LogoutText%2A>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus.LoginText%2A>egenskapen (avhengig av om brukeren er logget på), er `null`, en tom streng (""), eller et enkelt mellomrom (""), GetDesignTimeHtml metoden angir den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus.LogoutText%2A>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus.LoginText%2A>egenskapen etter behov, til den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>egenskapen omsluttet av parenteser ("[]").</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus.LoginText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus.LogoutText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus.LoginText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus.LogoutText%2A>

trans-unit.source: Then, regardless of the setting of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus.LoginText%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus.LogoutText%2A>, the GetDesignTimeHtml method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CompositeControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> base method to generate the markup for the design-time rendering of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> control.
trans-unit.target: Deretter, uavhengig av innstillingen for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus.LoginText%2A>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus.LogoutText%2A>, GetDesignTimeHtml metodekall den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CompositeControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>basere metode for å generere markup utformingen gjengivelse av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CompositeControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus.LogoutText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus.LoginText%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string containing the markup used to render the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus"></xref> at design time.
trans-unit.target: En streng som inneholder markup brukes til å gjengi den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus"> </xref> under utformingen.

trans-unit.source: Prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Forbereder utformeren for å vise, redigere og utforme den tilknyttede kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The visual designer calls the Initialize method when it is ready to use the designer to render the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> control.
trans-unit.target: Den visuelle utformeren kaller i initialiseringsmetoden når den er klar til å bruke designer til å gjengi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus>

trans-unit.source: The Initialize and its base methods configure properties and set up events that are necessary for the operation of the designer.
trans-unit.target: Initialiseringen og tilhørende base metoder Konfigurer egenskaper og hendelser som er nødvendige for operasjonen av designer.

trans-unit.source: The `component` parameter is the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> control that is associated with this designer or a copy of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> control.
trans-unit.target: Den `component` parameteren er av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus>kontrollen som er tilknyttet utformeren eller en kopi av det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus"></xref>, which implements an <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus"> </xref>, som implementerer en <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the designer should use a temporary copy rather than the actual control that is associated with the designer to generate the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om designer må bruke en midlertidig kopi i stedet for den faktiske kontrollen som er forbundet med designer for å generere utformingen markup.

trans-unit.source: Because the UsePreviewControl property is always `true`, the designer <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A> property returns a copy of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> control to generate the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: Fordi egenskapen UsePreviewControl alltid `true`, designer <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A>egenskapen returnerer en kopi av det tilknyttede <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus>kontrollen til å generere utformingen markup.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A> property creates the copy by persisting the actual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> control, then parsing the persisted control string.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A>egenskapen oppretter kopien av persisting den faktiske <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus>kontrollen, og deretter analyse faste kontroll-streng.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: The copied control does not affect any persistence for the actual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus>.
trans-unit.target: Kopierte kontrollen påvirker ikke noen utholdenhet for den faktiske <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus>

trans-unit.source: If the UsePreviewControl property has been overridden to return `false`, the designer will use the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> itself to generate the design-time markup, and design-time changes to the control will persist to the page markup source.
trans-unit.target: Hvis egenskapen UsePreviewControl er overstyrt for å returnere `false`, designer bruker den tilknyttede <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus>selve å generere utformingen markup, og endre utformingen kontrollen vil beholde siden markup kilde.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus>

trans-unit.source: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
